reasons_to_visit.details: August maintains excellent weather conditions ideal for all tourist activities.
Continued festival season with outdoor concerts and cultural celebrations.
Peak season for Prague's famous beer garden culture with warm evenings.
Extended time for comprehensive exploration without rush.
All seasonal activities at their peak including river cruises and park events.

reasons_to_avoid.details: August shares July's crowd levels with very busy attractions and dining venues.
Can be uncomfortably hot during midday, especially in crowded tourist areas.
Continued peak season pricing for all services and accommodations.
Some local businesses may close as Czechs take their own summer holidays.
